name: build
description: build file for Live Share SDK

scripts.prehoist: shx cp package-lock.json package-lock.bak && shx cp -n package-lock.json lerna-package-lock.json && shx rm package-lock.json && shx cp lerna-package-lock.json package-lock.json
scripts.posthoist: shx cp package-lock.json lerna-package-lock.json && shx cp package-lock.bak package-lock.json && shx rm package-lock.bak
